unnormalised: Okay, so return policies, right? Been burned before! Remember that Diwali saree I ordered online? Turns out, it was totally the wrong size. Thankfully, the return was smooth, unlike Raju's experience with his new phone from that Delhi store. He had a terrible time! Return policies need to be clear as day, like the instructions to make perfect biryani. Otherwise, no one's happy.
